# <b> Scripts: Study </b> {.tabset}

<p style="font-size:11px; line-height: 1; font-family: Noto Sans JP;  color: #202020;">There are 3 writing system used in Japanese namely the **Kanji**, **Hiragana** and the **Katakana** scripts.</p>

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### SCR:01 Hiragana

<p style="font-size:11px; line-height: 1; font-family: Noto Sans JP;  color: #202020;">**Hiragana** is a phonetic script used to represent Japanese sound.</p>

![](hh.jpg)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### SCR:02 Katakana

<p style="font-size:11px; line-height: 1; font-family: Noto Sans JP;  color: #202020;">**Katakana** is a phonetic script used to represent Foreign loan words.</p>

![](hk.jpg)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### SCR:03 Kanji {.tabset}

<p style="font-size:11px; line-height: 1; font-family: Noto Sans JP;  color: #202020;">**Kanji** was based on Chinese characters which represents a word and a meaning.</p>

#### L5 {.tabset}

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}

scknj5 <- scknj5[sample(1:nrow(scknj5)),]

reactable(
  scknj5,
  columns = list(
    Kanji = colDef(style= list(background = '#e0e1dd'),
      # Show species under character names
      cell = function(value, index) {
        Meaning <- scknj5$Meaning[index]
        Meaning <- if (!is.na(Meaning)) Meaning else ""
        NR <- scknj5$NR[index]
        NR <- if (!is.na(NR)) NR else ""
        KR <- scknj5$KR[index]
        KR <- if (!is.na(KR)) KR else ""
        tagList(
          div(style = list(fontSize = 32, fontWeight = 600, color = '#0F2040', fontFamily = 'Open Sans'), value),
          div(style = list(fontSize = 9, color = '#008000', fontFamily = 'Open Sans'), NR),
          div(style = list(fontSize = 9, color = '#800000', fontFamily = 'Open Sans'), KR),
          div(style = list(fontSize = 9, fontWeight = 500, color = '#0F2040'), Meaning)
        )
      },
      align = "center"
    ),
    W1 = colDef(style= list(background = '#edede9'),
      cell = function(value, index) {
        M1 <- scknj5$M1[index]
        M1 <- if (!is.na(M1)) M1 else ""
        R1 <- scknj5$R1[index]
        R1 <- if (!is.na(R1)) R1 else ""
        tagList(
          div(style = list(fontSize = 21, fontWeight = 600, color = '#0F2040', fontFamily = 'Open Sans'), value),
          div(style = list(fontSize = 9, fontWeight = 400, color = '#026450'), R1),
          div(style = list(fontSize = 9, fontWeight = 400, color = '#800000'), M1),
        )
      },
      align = "center"
    ),
    W2 = colDef(style= list(background = '#edede9'),
      cell = function(value, index) {
        M2 <- scknj5$M2[index]
        M2 <- if (!is.na(M2)) M2 else ""
        R2 <- scknj5$R2[index]
        R2 <- if (!is.na(M2)) R2 else ""
        tagList(
          div(style = list(fontSize = 21, fontWeight = 600, color = '#0F2040', fontFamily = 'Open Sans'), value),
          div(style = list(fontSize = 9, fontWeight = 400, color = '#026450'), R2),
          div(style = list(fontSize = 9, fontWeight = 400, color = '#800000'), M2),
        )
      },
      align = "center"
    ),
    W3 = colDef(style= list(background = '#edede9'),
      cell = function(value, index) {
        M3 <- scknj5$M3[index]
        M3 <- if (!is.na(M3)) M3 else ""
        R3 <- scknj5$R3[index]
        R3 <- if (!is.na(R3)) R3 else ""
        tagList(
          div(style = list(fontSize = 21, fontWeight = 600, color = '#0F2040', fontFamily = 'Open Sans'), value),
          div(style = list(fontSize = 9, fontWeight = 400, color = '#026450'), R3),
          div(style = list(fontSize = 9, fontWeight = 400, color = '#800000'), M3),
        )
      },
      align = "center"
    ),
    R1 = colDef(show = FALSE),
    R2 = colDef(show = FALSE),
    R3 = colDef(show = FALSE),
    M1 = colDef(show = FALSE),
    M2 = colDef(show = FALSE),
    M3 = colDef(show = FALSE),
    Meaning = colDef(show = FALSE),
    NR = colDef(show = FALSE),
    KR = colDef(show = FALSE)
  ),
  rowClass = "my-row",
  defaultPageSize = 5,
  theme = reactableTheme(
    cellStyle = list(display = "flex", flexDirection = "column", justifyContent = "center", fontSize = "11px", height = 100),
    searchInputStyle = list(
      paddingLeft = "8px",
      paddingTop = "8px",
      paddingBottom = "8px",
      width = "100%",
      fontSize = "11px"
    )
  ),
  showPageInfo = FALSE, bordered = FALSE, searchable = TRUE, sortable = FALSE, paginationType = "numbers", outlined = TRUE, borderless = FALSE, striped = FALSE, highlight = TRUE,

  style = list(fontFamily = "Noto Sans JP, Heiti SC, Hiragino Maru Gothic ProN, Anonymous Pro , monospace, Helvetica Neue", fontSize = "11px")
)
```

#### L2 {.tabset}

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}

scknj2.a <- scknj2 %>% slice(201:380)
scknj2.b <- scknj2 %>% slice(1:200)
scknj2.a <- scknj2.a[sample(1:nrow(scknj2.a)),]
scknj2.b <- scknj2.b[sample(1:nrow(scknj2.b)),]
scknj2 <- bind_rows(scknj2.a, scknj2.b)
scknj2 <- scknj2[sample(1:nrow(scknj2)),]

reactable(
```

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
knjduv2.a <- knjduv2 %>% slice(1:34)
knjduv2.a <- knjduv2.a[sample(1:nrow(knjduv2.a)),]

reactable(
  knjduv2.a,
  columns = list(
       Kanji = colDef(style= list(background = '#e0e1dd'),
         #style = list(fontSize = "50px", fontWeight = 700), align = "center"
      #   style = JS("function(rowInfo, colInfo, state) {
      #   var firstSorted = state.sorted[0]
      #   if (!firstSorted || firstSorted.id === 'Kanji') {

      #     if (prevRow && rowInfo.row['Kanji'] === prevRow['Kanji']) {
      #       return { visibility: 'hidden' }
      #     }
      #   }
      # }"),
      cell = function(value, index) {
        Reading <- knjduv2.a$Reading[index]
        Reading <- if (!is.na(Reading)) Reading else "Unknown"
        tagList(
          div(style = list(fontSize = 35, fontWeight = 800, color = '#0F2040', fontFamily = 'Open Sans'), value),
          div(style = list(fontSize = 11, fontWeight = 500, color = '#800000', fontFamily = 'Open Sans'), Reading)
        )
      },
      align = "center", minWidth = 50
      ),

      Script = colDef(
      cell = function(value, index) {
        Translation <- knjduv2.a$Translation[index]
        Translation <- if (!is.na(Translation)) Translation else ""
        S1 <- knjduv2.a$S1[index]
        S1 <- if (!is.na(S1)) S1 else ""
        S2 <- knjduv2.a$S2[index]
        S2 <- if (!is.na(S2)) S2 else ""
        S3 <- knjduv2.a$S3[index]
        S3 <- if (!is.na(S3)) S3 else ""
        S4 <- knjduv2.a$S4[index]
        S4 <- if (!is.na(S4)) S4 else ""
        S5 <- knjduv2.a$S5[index]
        S5 <- if (!is.na(S5)) S5 else ""
        S6 <- knjduv2.a$S6[index]
        S6 <- if (!is.na(S6)) S6 else ""
        S7 <- knjduv2.a$S7[index]
        S7 <- if (!is.na(S7)) S7 else ""
        T1 <- knjduv2.a$T1[index]
        T1 <- if (!is.na(T1)) T1 else ""
        T2 <- knjduv2.a$T2[index]
        T2 <- if (!is.na(T2)) T2 else ""
        T3 <- knjduv2.a$T3[index]
        T3 <- if (!is.na(T3)) T3 else ""
        T4 <- knjduv2.a$T4[index]
        T4 <- if (!is.na(T4)) T4 else ""
        T5 <- knjduv2.a$T5[index]
        T5 <- if (!is.na(T5)) T5 else ""
        T6 <- knjduv2.a$T6[index]
        T6 <- if (!is.na(T6)) T6 else ""
        T7 <- knjduv2.a$T7[index]
        T7 <- if (!is.na(T7)) T7 else ""
        tagList(
          div(span(style = list(fontSize = 17, fontWeight = 600, color = '#0F2040', fontFamily = 'Open Sans'), value), span(style = list(fontSize = 10, color = '#026450'), " ", Translation)),
          div(span(style = list(fontSize = 17, fontWeight = 600, color = '#0F2040', fontFamily = 'Open Sans'), S1), span(style = list(fontSize = 10, color = '#026450'), " ",T1)),
          div(span(style = list(fontSize = 17, fontWeight = 600, color = '#0F2040', fontFamily = 'Open Sans'), S2), span(style = list(fontSize = 10, color = '#026450'), " ",T2)),
          div(span(style = list(fontSize = 17, fontWeight = 600, color = '#0F2040', fontFamily = 'Open Sans'), S3), span(style = list(fontSize = 10, color = '#026450'), " ",T3)),
          div(span(style = list(fontSize = 17, fontWeight = 600, color = '#0F2040', fontFamily = 'Open Sans'), S4), span(style = list(fontSize = 10, color = '#026450'), " ",T4)),
          div(span(style = list(fontSize = 17, fontWeight = 600, color = '#0F2040', fontFamily = 'Open Sans'), S5), span(style = list(fontSize = 10, color = '#026450'), " ",T5)),
          div(span(style = list(fontSize = 17, fontWeight = 600, color = '#0F2040', fontFamily = 'Open Sans'), S6), span(style = list(fontSize = 10, color = '#026450'), " ",T6)),
          div(span(style = list(fontSize = 17, fontWeight = 600, color = '#0F2040', fontFamily = 'Open Sans'), S7), span(style = list(fontSize = 10, color = '#026450'), " ",T7)),
        )
      },
      align = "left"
    ),

      T4 = colDef(show = FALSE),
      T5 = colDef(show = FALSE),
      T6 = colDef(show = FALSE),
      T7 = colDef(show = FALSE)
  ),
    rowClass = "my-row",
    outlined = TRUE, defaultPageSize = 1, compact = FALSE, highlight = TRUE, fullWidth = TRUE,
  showPageInfo = FALSE, bordered = TRUE, searchable = TRUE, sortable = FALSE, paginationType = "numbers", striped = TRUE,
  style = list(fontFamily = "Noto Sans JP, Heiti SC, Hiragino Maru Gothic ProN, Anonymous Pro , monospace, Helvetica Neue", fontSize = "11px"),
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
knjsnt.l4 <- knjsnt.l4[sample(1:nrow(knjsnt.l4)),]
knjsnt.l3 <- knjsnt.l3[sample(1:nrow(knjsnt.l3)),]
```
